notableFindings: DL3028 false positive on gem install -v version values
improvements: Fixed DL3028 gem version flag parsing

notableFindings: DL3018 false positive: inline comments in continuations parsed as package names; DL3006 false positive on stage aliases with ARG vars
improvements: Fixed lexer to strip comments in continuations
Fixed DL3006 to skip stage aliases

notableFindings: DL3006 false positive on internal stage names (gobuild, gorun)
improvements: Fixed DL3006 stage alias detection

notableFindings: DL3001 flags vim/nano in devcontainer (expected for dev images). DV1003 pipe to shell detected. Many DL3008 version pinning warnings.
DV1001 false positive: _FILE suffix ENV vars (Docker secrets file path convention) flagged as hardcoded secrets
improvements: Fixed DV1001 to skip _FILE suffix ENV vars (Docker secrets convention)

notableFindings: DL3001 flags 'mount' keyword in comments about BuildKit --mount. Heavy DL3018 apk version pinning warnings.
DV1006 false positive on distroless nonroot base images
improvements: Fixed DV1006 to skip nonroot distroless base images

notableFindings: Heavy DL3008 apt version pinning (68 findings). DL3004 sudo usage in builder stages. All findings appear legitimate.
DL3041 (77x) dnf version pinning. DV1001 correctly detected hardcoded COSIGN_PASSWORD=Harbor12345 in test Dockerfiles. Large repo with many Dockerfiles.
DV1006 false positive on chainguard/static base via stage alias (Dockerfile.distroless)
improvements: Fixed DV1006 to resolve stage aliases and recognize cgr.dev/chainguard/static

notableFindings: All findings appear legitimate. Heavy DL3008/DL3015 in contrib Dockerfiles.
Heavy DL3029 platform mismatch warnings (cross-compilation). All findings legitimate.
DL3001 false positive: BuildKit --mount=type=cache flagged as mount command
improvements: Fixed DL3001 to strip --mount= flags before command detection

notableFindings: Heavy dnf/apk version pinning. DV1003 curl|sh in cross-compile Dockerfile. All findings legitimate.
DL3001 false positive on --mount (same issue as envoy). DV2001/DV2008 apt-get update separation in RELEASING Dockerfiles. DV3008 git clone credential warning.
DV1001 correctly flags PGPASSWORD=password in test Dockerfile. DV1009 false positives on stage aliases and ARG vars.
improvements: Fixed DV1009 to skip stage aliases and ARG variable references

notableFindings: DV1009 reduced from 47 to 9 after fix (38 false positives on stage aliases/ARG vars eliminated). Heavy DL3008/DL3006/DL3018 version pinning.
improvements: Fixed DV1009 to skip stage aliases and ARG variable references

notableFindings: All findings legitimate. Small well-maintained Dockerfiles.
All findings legitimate. DEBIAN_FRONTEND as ENV (DV4007), apt-get cache issues, DV4012 consecutive COPY in multi-stage builds.
All findings legitimate. Base image uses ARG var (DL3006). Dockerfile.base is single-stage with build tools (DV1004).
All findings legitimate. Example Dockerfiles with deprecated MAINTAINER, unpinned pip packages, missing --no-cache-dir.
All findings legitimate. DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR, DV4012 consecutive COPY, DV1009 digest pinning recommendations.
DV1009 false positive: heredoc COPY <<EOF embedding Python code (from __future__, pathlib, packaging.utils) parsed as FROM instructions
improvements: Added heredoc syntax support to lexer - skips <<DELIM body content to prevent false FROM detection

notableFindings: Heavy DV4012 consecutive COPY (17x). DV1009 digest pinning (15x). All findings legitimate.
DV1001 correctly flags GITLAB_ROOT_PASSWORD in ENV. DL3001 flags kill command in RUN. Heavy DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR. All findings legitimate.
DV1001 correctly flags 34 intentional ARG AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=FAKE in test fixture. Heavy DV4012 consecutive COPY. All findings legitimate.
DV1003 curl|sh in installer scripts. Heavy DL3008 apt version pinning. DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR (20x). All findings legitimate.
All findings legitimate. Build/test Dockerfiles with expected issues (no USER, unpinned apt, COPY .).
SDK runtime Dockerfiles are minimal stubs (expected). PHP dev.Dockerfile has curl|sh and multi-stage issues. All findings legitimate.
DL3021 correctly flags COPY with 3 args where dest lacks trailing /. All findings legitimate.
DV4011 false positive on quoted absolute WORKDIR ("/app"). DL3000 also triggered (same root cause in DL3000 uses w.path which is OK).
improvements: Fixed DV4011 to strip surrounding quotes before checking absolute/relative paths

notableFindings: Heavy DL3029 --platform warnings (cross-compilation CI). DV4012 consecutive COPY. All findings legitimate.
DV1001 correctly flags NEXTAUTH_SECRET in ARG. DL3044 correctly flags self-referencing ENV vars. All findings legitimate.
DV1001 correctly flags POSTGRES_PASSWORD in test Dockerfile. Heavy DL3008 apt version pinning. Community boilerplates have DL3000/DL3020 issues. All findings legitimate.
Heavy DV1003 curl|sh in build scripts (9 findings, all legitimate). DV1001 correctly flags GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning.
Heavy DV4012 consecutive COPY (31x). DV1001 correctly flags POSTGRES_PASSWORD. DL3020 ADD usage in preview Dockerfile. All findings legitimate.
DV1009 false positive on Jinja2 template variables ({{ base_image }}) in Dockerfile.j2 files
improvements: Fixed DV1009 to skip Jinja2 template variables

notableFindings: All findings legitimate. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning, DV4003 missing WORKDIR in multi-stage ML builds.
All findings legitimate. Clean multi-stage Go builds with minor DL3045/DV1009 issues.

notes: FP found: DL3029 on $BUILDPLATFORM - fixed
Clean scan, no FP
e2e Dockerfiles, clean scan

issues: DL3008, DV1009, DV4010(FP fixed), DL3018(FP fixed)

notes: Clean scan, no FP. Standard Rust multi-stage build with Alpine.
Large test fixture collection. DV1001 correctly flags GITHUB_TOKEN in test ARG. All findings legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. Multi-arch build with debian/ubi/fedora bases.
Clean scan, no FP. Minimal Alpine-based Dockerfiles with standard DL3018 apk pinning warnings.
Clean scan, no FP. DV1003 correctly flags curl|sh pattern. DV4010 recursive chown warning legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning (15x) in build Dockerfile. DV4009 correctly flags chmod 777.
Clean scan, no FP. Large repo with many docker/ Dockerfiles for different components. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning (58x), DL3029 platform flags (27x cross-compilation).
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 ADD for local files, DL3004 sudo usage in patch-go Dockerfile. All findings legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. Single large Dockerfile with multi-stage multi-arch build. Heavy DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR (16x), DL3041 dnf pinning, DL3040 dnf cache.
Clean scan, no FP. DV1003 correctly flags curl|sh in Dockerfile. Heavy DL3018 apk pinning (27x). Build/dev Dockerfiles with expected DV1006.
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 correctly flags ADD in sad-path Dockerfile. Heavy DV1009 digest pinning (13x). DV1006 on build/test Dockerfiles (expected).
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 correctly flags ADD usage across all Dockerfiles (6x). Simple Go multi-stage builds.
DV3005 FP: public GPG keyrings (docker.gpg, hashicorp.gpg) flagged as private keys - fixed. DV1003 correctly flags curl|sh. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning (60x).
Clean scan, no FP. DV1006 correctly flags non-minimal base images. DL3057 HEALTHCHECK missing across all files.
Clean scan, no FP. Standard Go Alpine multi-stage builds with DL3018 apk pinning warnings.
Clean scan, no FP. Standard Alpine multi-stage build with DL3018 apk pinning and DL3057 HEALTHCHECK missing.
Clean scan, no FP. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning (46x) across Dockerfile and Dockerfile.ci. DL3004 sudo in CI Dockerfile is legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 ADD in main Dockerfile, DV3004 cert copying in test/conformance Dockerfiles (intentional test certs for TLS testing), DV1006 no USER in several files.
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 ADD usage in multiple Dockerfiles. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning. DL3006 on cgr.dev/chainguard/wolfi-base (no version tag) is legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. DV1003 curl|sh in Dockerfile.dapper/local/test (build tooling). DL3000 relative WORKDIR. All legitimate.
FP found and fixed: DV3001 GOOG pattern matched GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS/GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT names (3 FPs). DV1001 flagged google_credentials.json filename as secret value (1 FP). Both fixed.

notes: Clean scan, no FP. Heavy DV1009 digest pinning (19x), DV1006 no USER (12x). DV2002 correctly flags dist-upgrade in regression/Dockerfile. DL3002 last USER root in collector.Dockerfile legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. DL3018 apk pinning (12x). DV4004 ARG after ENV (2x) legitimate. Standard Go Alpine multi-stage builds.
Clean scan, no FP. Template Dockerfiles (*.header.template). DL3006 on $BASE_IMAGE and _REPLACE_BASE_IMAGE_ template placeholders - legitimate (no version in FROM). DV1003 curl|sh legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. Standard multi-stage builds. DV1009 digest pinning (7x), DV1006 no USER.
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 ADD for local files legitimate. DL3018 apk pinning (14x).
Clean scan, no FP. DV3014 correctly flags hardcoded DB connection strings in prod.Dockerfile (2x). DV3003 COPY .env legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. Minimal findings on well-maintained Dockerfiles.
Clean scan, no FP. Heavy DL3018 apk pinning. DV4012 consecutive COPY.
Clean scan, no FP. Multi-arch Go Alpine builds. DV1009 (8x), DV4003 no WORKDIR.
FP fixed: DV1001 flagged ARG TELEMETRY_PRIVATE_KEY="" (empty-string default) as hardcoded secret. Parser fix: strip quotes from ARG default values.
Clean scan, no FP. Heavy DL3018 apk pinning (25x) in multi-stage Python builds.
Clean scan, no FP. DV3014 correctly flags hardcoded dummy DB URL for Next.js build (postgresql://user:pass@localhost:5432/dummy).
Clean scan, no FP. Standard Next.js multi-stage build. DV1009 digest pinning, DL3018 apk pinning.
Clean scan, no FP. DV1003 curl|sh in Dockerfile.dev, DL3000 relative WORKDIR - both legitimate. DL3006 on ${BUILD_FROM} ARG with no default is legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. Minimal well-maintained Alpine build.
Clean scan, no FP. DV1003 curl|sh in Dockerfile.neuron, DL3020 ADD in Dockerfile.nix - legitimate. Heavy DL3008 apt pinning (32x).
Clean scan, no FP. DL3020 ADD in ioredis.Dockerfile, DL3000 relative WORKDIR in pascaldekloe/relay Dockerfiles - all legitimate. DV3008 git clone (5x).
Clean scan, no FP. Heavy DL3008 apt (16x), DL3018 apk (13x). DL3003 cd instead of WORKDIR (4x) legitimate.
Clean scan, no FP. DL3025 CMD without JSON notation (9x). Heavy DV1009 digest pinning recommendations.
Clean scan, no FP. DV4007 DEBIAN_FRONTEND as ENV, DV4008 TODO comment - informational findings.

FP fixed: DL3006 flagged FROM base-source-${BUILD_TYPE} and FROM base-${BUILD_TYPE} as missing version tags. These are internal stage aliases resolved via ARG BUILD_TYPE=docker. Fix: DL3006 now substitutes all ARG vars to get fully-resolved name.
Clean scan, no FP. Very heavy DL3018 apk pinning (40x) in PHP/Alpine builds. DL3008 apt pinning (14x).
Clean scan, no FP. DL3008 apt pinning (9x). DL3013 pip pinning. Standard Python Alpine build.

notableFindings: DL3000 on relative WORKDIR, DL3057 on many Dockerfiles without HEALTHCHECK

improvements: Fixed: exclude .erb/.j2/.tmpl/.tpl/.jinja/.template files from scanning (template FP)

Large workspace image with DL3004 (sudo usage) and DV1003 (curl|bash patterns)
Dockerfile.template files (with Go-template placeholders like ALPINE_BASEIMAGE) were causing DL3006/DV1009 false positives; fixed by template exclusion
improvements: Fixed: exclude .template files from scanning (placeholder FP)

notableFindings: All findings legitimate (DL3018 apk pinning, DL3057 HEALTHCHECK)

improvements: Fixed: DV1003 regex now uses \b word boundary to avoid matching sha256sum as shell

FP found: DL3010 flagged COPY exclamation.zip as 'Use ADD for extracting archives'  but Docker ADD does NOT auto-extract .zip files (only tar archives). Fixed by removing .zip from ARCHIVE_PATTERN. DL3018 apk pinning (98x) dominant.
improvements: Fixed DL3010/DL3020: remove .zip from ARCHIVE_PATTERN  Docker ADD cannot auto-extract zip files, only tar-based archives (.tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, .tar.bz2, .tar.xz, .tar.zst)
